about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Saroja Pharma Industries India Limited is engaged in trading, exporting and supplying Specialty Chemicals & API.

The company deals in three types of product categories:

1. Chemical, 2. Pharma Intermediary and 3. Veterinary Pharma API. The company supplies products such as Liquide Bromine, which is used as an agro-intermediate, Ethyl Acetate, which is used as an API solvent, and other pharmaceuticals used for human and veterinary drugs, and some of them are API solvents.

APIs, known as bulk drugs or bulk actives, are the principal ingredients used in making finished dosages in the form of capsules, tablets, liquid or other forms of dosage, with the addition of other APIs or inactive ingredients.

The company exports products mainly in Pakistan, Egypt, Russia, Jordan, Hong Kong, Singapore etc.

Competitive Strength:

  • Experienced Promoters and Management Team
  • Scalable Business Model
  • Wide and diverse range of product offerings
  • Diversified business operations and revenue base

faqs.question: What is the Saroja Pharma Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Saroja Pharma Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 1084800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.11 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹84 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on August 31, 2023, and closes on September 5, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Saroja Pharma Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Saroja Pharma Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Saroja Pharma Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Saroja Pharma Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Saroja Pharma Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Saroja Pharma Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Saroja Pharma Industries IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,34,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Saroja Pharma Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Saroja Pharma Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Saroja Pharma Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Saroja Pharma Industries IPO will be done on Friday, September 8, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 12, 2023. Check the Saroja Pharma Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Saroja Pharma Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Saroja Pharma Industries IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 13, 2023.
